subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: SI mapping completed, 2 stakeholder consultations conducted, MHSW provided with social indicators, Social welfare law review prepared, residential institutions assessed, draft action plan for the development of community social services finished.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Strengthening social inclusion

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
THE RIGHT TO LIVE IN THE COMMUNITY, SOCIAL INCLUSION AND PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES:
Support to excluded groups through community based services: support services for children with disabilities living in specialised foster care; development of a model of educational inclusion;  employability and employment opportunities analysis; support for development of national M&E system (UN Convention implementation and national disability strategy); advocacy.
subproject.title: People with disabilities
